Mayor
-----

**![01-23 mayor](https://www.cityoflaredo.com/home/showpublishedimage/608/638100979621070000)
[Dr. Victor D. Trevi単o](https://www.cityoflaredo.com/government/mayor-city-council/mayor-dr-victor-d-trevi-o)**
Term: Dec. 2022 to Nov. 2026

Select a Council Member to learn more.
